definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Checks if block right clicked by the player is log (you can change it to whatever you want)</comment><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BirchTannerLeatherWithLeather</field></block></value><value name="b"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_replace"><field name="state">TRUE</field><field name="nbt">TRUE</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Replace the log block to its stripped version.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BirchTannerLeather</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.LEATHER</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
